rules_text:
Once each turn, when Atal, the Shroudmaker enters or you attack with one or more Horrors, you may create two tapped 1/1 colorless Human creature tokens. If Atal isn't a token, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
{2}{W}{W}, Discard Atal: Create a token that's a copy of Atal, the Shroudmaker, except it's 4/4 and isn't legendary. Activate only as a sorcery.
